query:
SELECT schedule_objs.time_link_id, schedule_objs.subject_id FROM schedule_objs WHERE schedule_objs.group_id = $5 AND schedule_objs.time = $4 AND week_day = $3 AND week_parity = $6 AND schedule_objs.gen_end IS NULL AND CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT enable_auto_attendance FROM user_attendance_schedule_diffs WHERE user_id = $1 AND week_num = $2 AND schedule_objs.time_link_id = user_attendance_schedule_diffs.schedule_obj_time_link_id)THEN (SELECT enable_auto_attendance FROM user_attendance_schedule_diffs WHERE user_id = $1 AND week_num = $2 AND schedule_objs.time_link_id = user_attendance_schedule_diffs.schedule_obj_time_link_id)
    ELSE (SELECT enable_auto_attendance FROM user_attendance_schedule WHERE user_id = $1 AND schedule_objs.time_link_id = user_attendance_schedule.schedule_obj_time_link_id) END
